review_blob: Got a bottle as a gift in a party pack. Love this beer. Dark, chocolate malty taste. 9% alcohol. Will be looking to find where I can buy this. LOVED IT!
beer_name: Charlevoix Vache Folle Imperial Milk Stout

review_blob: This is my third favourite beer. #1 is Canterbury Dark Mild, #2 is Rickards Red, and #3 is Corona. Must admit that I prefer it with a lime. I choose this one if I want a light tasting beer and usually order it if out at a restaurant or bar. At home it is Canterbury and at pub is Rickards (unless they have Canterbury).

I wish I liked this beer. Love the name being a proud Canadian, but to me, it has a bad after-taste. Tried it several times over the years when it was the only choice. That said, I understand if others love this beer, everyone has their own taste. Love Molsons Rickards Red though.
Used to be my favourite until I found Canterbury Dark Mild. My beer of choice if out and they dont serve my fav. Nice rich full bodied flavour.
Since I discovered this beer it is all I drink at home. It has a unique malt caramel flavour. Not for everyone of course, but I LOVE this beer!
